nhc_headline: ...FRANCINE BECOMES A CATEGORY 2 HURRICANE AS THE EYE APPROACHES  THE LOUISIANA COAST... ...LIFE-THREATENING STORM SURGE AND HURRICANE CONDITIONS SPREADING ONTO THE LOUISIANA COAST...
summary:
...FRANCINE BECOMES A CATEGORY 2 HURRICANE AS THE EYE APPROACHES  THE LOUISIANA COAST... ...LIFE-THREATENING STORM SURGE AND HURRICANE CONDITIONS SPREADING ONTO THE LOUISIANA COAST...
 As of 4:00 PM CDT Wed Sep 11
 the center of Francine was located near 29.2, -91.5
 with movement NE at 17 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 972 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 100 mph.
